Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post in the campus social circle.

authorId.description: ID of the user who created the post.

authorName.description: Name of the user who created the post.

authorAvatarId.description: Avatar ID of the user who created the post.

content.description: The text content of the post.

mediaUrls.description: URLs of media attached to the post.

location.description: Location associated with the post (e.g., building, library).

likeIds.description: Array of user IDs who liked the post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was created.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

role.description: User's role within the application (e.g., student, admin).

scheduleIds.description: References to Schedules created by the User. (Relationship: User 1:N Schedule)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was last updated.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a post.

postId.description: ID of the post this comment belongs to.

authorId.description: ID of the user who created the comment.

authorName.description: Name of the user who created the comment.

authorAvatarId.description: Avatar ID of the user who created the comment.

content.description: The text content of the comment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

Schedule.title: Schedule
Schedule.description: Represents a user's schedule for study/activities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the schedule entity.

userId.description: Reference to User who owns the schedule. (Relationship: User 1:N Schedule)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the schedule was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the schedule was last updated.

Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: Represents an online/offline activity or event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the activity entity.

organizerId.description: Reference to User who organized the activity. (Relationship: User 1:N Activity)

participantIds.description: References to Users participating in the Activity. (Relationship: User N:N Activity)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the activity was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the activity was last updated.

InterestGroup.title: InterestGroup
InterestGroup.description: Represents a group of users with shared interests.

id.description: Unique identifier for the interest group entity.

memberIds.description: References to Users who are members of the group. (Relationship: User N:N InterestGroup)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the group was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the group was last updated.
